data.heading: Air animals
data.rubric: Click on each label to know more about birds.
data.text: Air animals have bodies that help them to lift up and stay up in the air.
Birds have wings that help them to take off, fly, and land.
Birds have feathers to help them glide through the air.
Feathers help birds to keep their bodies warm and keep rain off them.
Most birds have beaks to help them pick up grains and seeds to eat.
data.Caption: bird
bat
butterfly
